Referred to the Committee on Natural Resources, and in addition to the Committee on the Budget, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and Mineral Resources

official_title: To distribute revenue from offshore wind projects in the New York Bight Area to certain coastal States, and promote conservation and workforce development.
short_title: Offshore Wind for Northeastern Energy Revenue Act

summary.text:
Offshore Wind for Northeastern Energy Revenue Act or the OWNER Act 

 This bill requires revenues from offshore wind projects on the Outer Continental Shelf within the New York Bight Area to be shared with adjacent coastal states and their political subdivisions. The New York Bight Area is the area extending generally northeast from Cape May in New Jersey to Montauk Point on the eastern tip of Long Island, New York.

titles.title: Offshore Wind for Northeastern Energy Revenue Act
To distribute revenue from offshore wind projects in the New York Bight Area to certain coastal States, and promote conservation and workforce development.
